metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3429 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
IPython Notebook 0.12 through 1.x before 1.2 does not validate the originof websocket requests, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode by leveraging knowledge of the kernel id and a crafted page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3429` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 1.2.1-2
ipython-notebook - 1.2.1-2
ipython-notebook-common - 1.2.1-2
ipython-qtconsole - 1.2.1-2
ipython3 - 1.2.1-2
ipython3-notebook - 1.2.1-2
ipython3-qtconsole - 1.2.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-2').
